name: Rocket Fist Hero(Complete Enough for a Jam Version)
name_original: Rocket Fist Hero(Complete Enough for a Jam Version)
description:
The WebGL version does not work as intended and has been removed. You can download the Windows version down below that should work correctly. Sorry for the inconvenience.

This was uploaded for the GMTK 2019 jam. I only had around 10 hours to work on this so hopefully it's good enough.  The theme was "Only One" and that was represented in this game by only being able to fire one punch at a time, to punch again you need to wait for your fist to return.

Use your fist of justice to punch through the robots invading the city. Try to get as high a score as you can without getting hit.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse Movement - Aim your punch
  • Left Click - Fire

Hitting multiple enemies with one punch will result in a higher score, so try to aim your shot to hit more than one robot.

Everything but the audio was created this jam, the music and sound is stuff I made a while back using Famitracker.
